content.rendered:
Teller Supervisor | Tulsa, Oklahoma
  • Full-Time position
  • Receive checks and cash for deposit, verifies amount, and examines checks for endorsements, balance drawer
  • Order daily supply of cash, and counts incoming cash
  • Will be responsible for the supervision of bank tellers
  • Must be able to multi-task effectively and pay close attention to detail
  • Must possess excellent customer service and communication skills
  • 2 years teller experience preferred, 1- 2 years teller supervisor experience required
  • $15-$16/hour depending on experience
